#summary contentForLayout()
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*:

Used inside a layout file to output the HTML created in the view.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

-

*Examples*:

{{{
<html>
  <head>
    <title>My Site</title>
  </head>
  <body>
  <cfoutput>
    #contentForLayout()#
  </cfoutput>
  </body>
</html>
}}}

 * [UsingLayouts UsingLayouts] (chapter)
